title: A little Italian gem
review: There are so many things to enjoy about this film; it's firm grasp of the logic of its implacable narrative, it's highly credible characters, the beautifully staged mis-en-scene, the sense of being given a genuine insight into a little known segment of Italian society, te delicious range of music, sometimes reminiscent of the most compelling Italian films of the sixties... I could go on, but judge for yourself...Go on, give yourself a melancholy treat!

title: Delicious
review: What a terrific little jewel, gem I discovered yesterday on Netflix. A movie which we could not see on big screen, or very rarely. This topic reminds me 99 HOMES, although not entirely the same, but very very close. A debt collectors tale, very bitter, sometimes cynical and depressing, although with a bit of black humour, as the italian movie industry provided us several decades ago...
